function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","Impact":"Reduced psychological well-being due to lower physical activity levels","Mitigation":"Encouraging and facilitating physical activity in various settings","Technologies":"Health and fitness tracking apps, smart wearables","People":"Subjects with low physical activity, young adults","Owner":"Health professionals, community organizations"},{"Description":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health during periods of forced rest","Mitigation":"Providing mental health resources and support, promoting home-based physical activity","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling platforms","People":"Individuals affected by pandemic restrictions","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
